headline: Illinois American Water Granted New Rates by Illinois Commerce Commission
summary: BELLEVILLE, Ill., December 06, 2024--The Illinois Commerce Commission (ICC) issued an order Thursday approving new water and wastewater base rates for Illinois American Water, driven primarily by $557 million in capital investments in 2024 and 2025. The rate change request was filed on January 25, 2024.

headline: California Public Utilities Commission Approves and Adopts Partial Settlement in California American Water’s General Rate Case
summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif., December 06, 2024--The California Public Utilities Commission (CPUC) approved and adopted a partial settlement agreement in California American Water’s General Rate Case at its meeting on December 5, 2024. The decision adopts a partial settlement between California American Water and the CPUC’s Public Advocates Office.

headline: Top dividend stocks to watch in 2025
summary: For investors looking to maximize their income next year, they should look into dividend stocks. Disney (DIS) is just one company that offers annual dividends, recently boosting theirs to $1.00 per share. Yahoo Finance's Rachelle Akuffo joins Alexandra Canal on wealth to share some of the highest-yielding dividend stocks according to the Yahoo Finance high-yield dividend stock watchlist. She mentions Vale S.A. (VALE), Icahn Enterprises L.P. (IEP), and ZIM Integrated Shipping Services Ltd. (ZIM) as some names to watch. For more expert insight and the latest market action, click here to watch this full episode of Wealth! This post was written by Cheyenne Reid.

headline: American Water Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., December 06, 2024--American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) announced that its board of directors today declared a quarterly cash dividend payment of $0.7650 per share of common stock, payable on March 4, 2025, to all shareholders of record as of February 7, 2025.
